description: The Kanji character 中 makes a great looking hammer for these kaomojis. A hammer is great to wack people over the head in like in Super Smash Brothers, or maybe these emotes have just gone a little crazy. If you show a kaomoji holding a hammer without adding in any other emoticons, then it just looks like a hard worker. title: Hammers
